relevant_findings.general: Elderly-appearing, cheerful, comfortable-appearing woman lying down in bed in no acute distress.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: II/6 crescendo-decrescendo systolic murmur that radiates to the carotids, loudest at the right intercostal space. Regular rate and rhythm.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Notably soft, non-tender, and non-distended with no masses or hepatosplenomegaly. No rebound tenderness or guarding.
relevant_findings.extremities: Non-palpable, pigmented rash in left lower extremity. Non-tender, no ulcers or lesions. No pitting edema. Distal pulses 2+.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented, moves all extremities.
